attribute.name: base
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The base color weight.

attribute.name: baseColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: The base color RGB values.

attribute.name: diffuseRoughness
attribute.label: Diffuse Roughness
attribute.description: The roughness of the diffuse layer.

attribute.name: metalness
attribute.label: Metalness
attribute.description: How metallic the material appears. At its maximum, the surface behaves like a metal, using fully specular reflection and complex fresnel.

attribute.name: specular
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The weight for specular reflections.

attribute.name: specularColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: Tints the color of specular reflections. In metallic mode this controls the reflection at grazing angles.

attribute.name: specularRoughness
attribute.label: Roughness
attribute.description: The roughness of the specular reflections. The lower the value, the sharper the reflection.

attribute.name: specularIOR
attribute.label: IOR
attribute.description: The index of refraction.

attribute.name: specularAnisotropy
attribute.label: Anisotropy
attribute.description: Reflects and transmits light with a directional bias and causes materials to appear rougher or glossier in certain directions.

attribute.name: specularRotation
attribute.label: Rotation
attribute.description: Rotates the anisotropic effect.

attribute.name: transmission
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: Allows light to transmit through the surface for materials such as glass or water. Increase this value for a more transparent material.

attribute.name: transmissionColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: Tints the color of transmitted light.

attribute.name: transmissionDepth
attribute.label: Depth
attribute.description: Controls the distance light travels inside the material before it becomes exactly the transmission color according to the law of Beer.

attribute.name: transmissionScatter
attribute.label: Scatter
attribute.description: Scattering coefficient of the interior medium. Suitable for a large body of liquid or one that is fairly thick, such as an ocean, honey, ice, or frosted glass.

attribute.name: transmissionScatterAnisotropy
attribute.label: Scatter Anisotropy
attribute.description: The amount of directional bias, or anisotropy, of the scattering.

attribute.name: transmissionDispersion
attribute.label: Dispersion Abbe
attribute.description: Dispersion Abbe number, describing how much the index of refraction varies across wavelengths.

attribute.name: transmissionExtraRoughness
attribute.label: Extra Roughness
attribute.description: Additional roughness on top of specular roughness. Positive values blur refractions more than reflections, and negative values blur refractions less.

attribute.name: subsurface
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The blend between diffuse reflection and subsurface scattering. Set to 1.0 for full subsurface scattering and 0 for only diffuse reflection.

attribute.name: subsurfaceColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: The color of the subsurface scattering effect.

attribute.name: subsurfaceRadius
attribute.label: Radius
attribute.description: The mean free path, distance which light can travel before being scattered inside the surface.

attribute.name: subsurfaceScale
attribute.label: Scale
attribute.description: Scalar weight for Subsurface Radius.

attribute.name: subsurfaceAnisotropy
attribute.label: Anisotropy
attribute.description: The direction of subsurface scattering. 0 scatters light evenly, positive values scatter forward and negative values scatter backward.

attribute.name: coat
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The weight of a reflective clear-coat layer on top of the material. Use for materials such as car paint or an oily layer.

attribute.name: coatColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: The transparency color of the clear-coat layer.

attribute.name: coatRoughness
attribute.label: Roughness
attribute.description: The roughness of the clear-coat reflections. The lower the value, the sharper the reflection.

attribute.name: coatIOR
attribute.label: IOR
attribute.description: The index of refraction of the clear-coat layer.

attribute.name: coatAnisotropy
attribute.label: Anisotropy
attribute.description: The amount of directional bias, or anisotropy, of the clear-coat layer.

attribute.name: coatRotation
attribute.label: Rotation
attribute.description: Rotates the anisotropic effect of the clear-coat layer.

attribute.name: coatAffectColor
attribute.label: Affect Color
attribute.description: Controls the saturation of diffuse reflection and subsurface scattering below the clear-coat.

attribute.name: coatAffectRoughness
attribute.label: Affect Roughness
attribute.description: Controls the roughness of the specular reflection in the layers below the clear-coat.

attribute.name: sheen
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The weight of a sheen layer that can be used to approximate microfibers or fabrics such as velvet and satin.

attribute.name: sheenColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: The color of the sheen layer.

attribute.name: sheenRoughness
attribute.label: Roughness
attribute.description: The roughness of the sheen layer.

attribute.name: emission
attribute.label: Weight
attribute.description: The amount of emitted incandescent light.

attribute.name: emissionColor
attribute.label: Color
attribute.description: The color of the emitted light.

attribute.name: thinFilmThickness
attribute.label: Thickness
attribute.description: The thickness of the thin film layer on a surface. Use for materials such as multitone car paint or soap bubbles.

attribute.name: thinFilmIOR
attribute.label: IOR
attribute.description: The index of refraction of the medium surrounding the material.

attribute.name: thinWalled
attribute.label: Thin Walled
attribute.description: If true the surface is double-sided and represents an infinitely thin shell. Use this for thin objects such as tree leafs or paper.

attribute.name: opacity
attribute.label: Opacity
attribute.description: The opacity of the entire material.
